channel.title: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam
channel.description: Alright so I bought 50m from rswalmart, every time I go into a live chat, the someone what English speaking person on the other end will type 1-2 things, disappear, and never show up again. Should I be patient, send an email, and wait? Or have I been scammed and need to move on?

item.title: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

They haven’t replyed to my dispute so in 5 days I’ll raise it to a claim.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam

item.title: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Playerauctions, they can be a bit annoyed with refunds but if someone doesn’t deliver on time etc you will get your irl gp back. The prices on the site are competitive too.

  • Take silabs advice.

Read full topic

@gothic_queen wrote:

if you are buying gold, don’t use these asian fucks. Just use Playerauctions, a trusted sythe member. You can shoot me a PM if you have any questions about buying.

item.title: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

just a word of advice if you do make contact with them they are going to ask you to close the dispute, do not close it until you have the gold on your account and make them aware that you are going to keep the dispute open until after its delivered. if you close it you will nto be able to reopen it, they will probably ask you many times to close it because once you do and they decide to not fulfill the order you really have no resource other than to file a dispute with your bank or credit card company which tends to be a hassle.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam

item.title: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

It says that the other party has to verify it though, I don’t even think that these guys are responsive. Their live chat is almost automated, and I haven’t gotten anything but half English automated emails…

EDIT: Check this out… Now they wanna talk.

Jessica 03-29 16:33:41 Hello, what can i do for you ? Jessica 03-29 16:33:46 let me check for you, wait a moment plz. You 03-29 16:33:54 Okay..... Jessica 03-29 16:34:26 may i knwo w Jessica 03-29 16:34:37 may i know w3hy u open the dispute? You 03-29 16:35:08 Because all of the people I've talked to so far have dissappeared and have not responded back, you're the first person to acutally say more than one thing You 03-29 16:35:26 If I could just get what I bought I'd be happy to remove the dispute and leave it
It's been 15min still no word. Like 6th time trying to talk to them.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Advice With Possible Gold Buying Scam

3lv3n snip3r:

If you paid via PayPal, you can request a refund up to 60 days after you paid for the item(s).

Oh really? Well I’m going to wait about an hour, try again, and if not, I’ll refund.

If I have to do this, is there a site that you’ve used and had a good experience with?
